body.p: This IFRS does not apply to changes in accounting policies made by an entity that already applies IFRSs. Such changes are the subject of:

li.p: requirements on changes in accounting policies in IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors; and
specific transitional requirements in other IFRSs.
